edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.keys

Class ScDSAPublicKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.keys.ScDSAPublicKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DSAPublicKey, java.io.Serializable, java.security.Key, java.security.PublicKey

    public class ScDSAPublicKey
extends java.lang.Object
implements DSAPublicKey
    This class represents a Public Key suitable for the Digital Signature Algorithm. Although the constructor is public, it should only be instantiated by the Digital Signature itself via the generateKey function.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
